arts.ttl: Juventus back in for Man Utd target Morten Hjulmand with Italian giants eyeing January move for Sporting CP midfielder
arts.sum: However Given his importance to the team and his long-term potential, Newcastle are unlikely to part ways with Tonali easily, making any potential transfer a difficult and expensive pursuit for interested clubs. Before his transfer to Saudi Arabia in 2023, Milinkovic-Savic spent eight successful seasons at Lazio, where he established himself as one of Serie A’s top midfielders and won two Coppa Italia titles.

arts.ttl: Juventus vs Sporting CP – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Juventus entertain Sporting CP this week in the league phase of the UEFA Champions League. The Turin giants are under pressure to secure points in the competition after a rocky start. Luciano Spalletti recently stepped in as Juventus manager following Igor Tudor’s departure due to an eight-match winless streak. arts.ttl: Juventus vs Sporting CP – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Juventus and Sporting CP will lock horns in a crucial UEFA Champions League group phase encounter on Tuesday evening at the Allianz Stadium in Turin.
